body:
The current package does not work. Updated to the latest unison version.

Also several ocaml versions which it depends on do not compile, e.g. 4.09.0.
Added compilation option that is required for many ocaml projects and bumped 
4.10.0 as a prerequisite.

The patches are taken from archlinux.or and are required to [build the package](https://github.com/bcpierce00/unison/issues/277)

The patches can be found [here](https://git.archlinux.org/svntogit/packages.git/tree/trunk?h=packages/unison).
title: Updated unison to v2.51.2
